A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Massive letdown. After seeing very positive reviews from critics I went in with high expectations. Wow was I wrong. This movie is a disgrace to the Star Wars franchise. It's way too long\, there is cheesy humor involved almost every 5 seconds\, and every scene tended to drag on and on. I want to know what kind of movie the critics saw because I did not see the same film. Honestly surprised this was the final cut for the film it was that bad. Truly disappointed.
